title: The Journal of Sir Walter Scott; From the Original Manuscript at Abbotsford
author: Scott, Walter

title: The Journal of Sir Walter Scott; From the Original Manuscript at Abbotsford
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: At Luscar I saw with pleasure the painting by Raeburn, of my oldfriend Adam Rolland, Esq.,[379] who was in the external circumstances,but not in frolic or fancy, my prototype for Paul Pleydell.[380]

title: The Journal of Sir Walter Scott; From the Original Manuscript at Abbotsford
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: We breakfasted at Luscar, a placebelonging to Adam Rolland, but the gout had arrested him at Edinburgh,so we were hospitably received by his family.

title: The Journal of Sir Walter Scott; From the Original Manuscript at Abbotsford
